tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    appliance_id INT,
    energy_consumed FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (appliance_id) REFERENCES eco_friendly_appliances(appliance_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_reports (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE NOT NULL,
    appliance_id INT NOT NULL,
    energy_usage FLOAT NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_appliance FOREIGN KEY (appliance_id) REFERENCES appliances (id)
);
